ages.infant_description: Learning feeds, sleep patterns—and perhaps first words or steps (1-12 months).
ages.toddler_description: Instinctively mobile, vocal, and testing boundaries (1-3 years).
ages.preschool_description: First social and imaginative leaps—kindergarten readiness (3-5 years).
ages.school_age_description: Learning, friendships, and growing independence (6-11 years).
ages.teenage_description: Emotional and social metamorphosis—puberty and self-identity (12-17 years).
ages.emerging_adult_description: Finding one's place—education, careers, relationships (18-24 years).
ages.seasoned_adult_description: Life-building years: family, career, deeper identity (25-39 years).
ages.midlife_mentor_description: Experienced, possibly raising next generation (40-59 years).
ages.elder_description: Reflective maturity: retirement, legacy building, and life wisdom (60+ years).
ages.youngling_description: Rapid growth and high energy—learning environment and boundaries (~0-2 years).
ages.adult_description: Fully mature, physically prime—steady and socially confident (~2-7 years).
ages.senior_description: Slower, possibly showing signs of aging—ideal for wisdom or frailty arcs (~7+ years).

photoUpload.title: Character Photo
photoUpload.consent: Upload a photo to personalize your character. Only share images you own, and if it's a child, make sure you're their parent or guardian.
photoUpload.infoTooltip: Your photo will only be used to create personalized illustrations of your character. Please upload only images you own the rights to. If the photo includes a child, you must be their parent or legal guardian and give consent before uploading. AI-generated images may not always be exact, and once shared outside Mythoria we can't control how they are used. For full details, see our <link>Privacy & Terms</link>.
